name: Claire Lilienthal School
description: Serves: Elementary and Middle School - K-8th grade Claire Lilienthal is located in San Francisco, California and is a California Distinguished School with a mission to inspire each student to achieve their maximum potential in an academically, culturally, and socially inclusive environment. Lilienthal was founded on the ideals of equity, academic excellence, and parent partnership. These ideals continue to support the work we do today. offering both General Education (English only) and a Korean
